overview:
Ian Sweeney was a founder and CEO of billFLO.com. Ian grew up in Ireland and has had a career devoted to bringing new products and services to market. From Entertainment Technologies to Automotive Components, Ian has worked around the world and with every size of company.

billFLO, acquired by Taulia, revolutionized the way businesses understand their finances and make the data actionable. billFLO was a Cash-Flow Management Solution for small business. We created a forward looking view of finances so small business could react to financial challenges and opportunities in their future.

Ian joined Taulia, a leader in Dynamic Discounting for large enterprises, as part of the billFLO acquisition. As a VP of Product at Taulia, Ian is responsible both for Product and Partner Integrations.
